case_title: ABDUR REHMAN vs SECRETARY TO THE GOVERNMENT OF WEST PAKISTAN, COLONY DEPARTMENT AND OTHERS
respondent: Secretary to the Government of West Pakistan, Colony Department and Others

key_points.notification_reference: Punjab Government Notification No. 2664-C dated 22nd September 1944
key_points.legal_basis: Section 10 (3) and (4) of the Colonization of Government Lands (Punjab) Act (1912)

judgment_summary.issue: Validity of lease cancellation and inclusion of leased lands under a new scheme.
judgment_summary.decision: Orders dated 19th January 1968 and subsequent actions declared without lawful authority and of no legal effect.
judgment_summary.reasoning: Collector's allotment and possession delivery made petitioners tenants under Section 10 (4). Commissioner approval deemed unnecessary for validity of leases.
